short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reczee Wand helps you to quickly perform your recruitment tasks with advanced automation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For job applicants on LinkedIn, iimjobs.com, hirist.tech, updazz.com - it is painful going over 100s of applicants manually and copy-pasting the emails, phone number, resume, name, etc, and putting them to your ATS (Applicant Tracking System) or the spreadsheet you maintain for your recruitment tracking. 

Reczee Wand enables you to just open the Applicants page and with a click of a button, you have all the information you need in a CSV format.
